statements.select: select id, id_usermobile, id_product_video, dec_prize, id_insert_by, id_update_by, dt_insert, dt_update, ind_active, ind_view, dt_view, int_rating, dt_rating, int_answered_questions_count, int_correct_answered_questions_count, dt_integrated, ind_integrated, dt_started_view, ind_goal, ind_has_won, ind_has_second_chance, int_attempt_count, ind_was_view_second, dt_was_view_second from tb_product_quiz_usermobile_prize
where id_usermobile = #userMobileId# and id_product_video = #videoId# and ind_active = 1

select p.id, p.id_usermobile, p.id_product_video, p.dec_prize, p.id_insert_by, p.id_update_by, p.dt_insert, p.dt_update, p.ind_active, p.ind_view, p.dt_view, p.int_rating, p.dt_rating, p.int_answered_questions_count, p.int_correct_answered_questions_count, p.dt_integrated, p.ind_integrated, p.ind_has_won, p.ind_has_second_chance, p.int_attempt_count, p.ind_was_view_second, p.dt_was_view_second from tb_product_quiz_usermobile_prize p inner join tb_product_video v on v.id = p.id_product_video where p.id_usermobile = #userMobileId# and v.id_product = #productId#
statements.update: update tb_product_quiz_usermobile_prize set id_usermobile = #UserMobileId#, id_product_video = #ProductVideoId#, dec_prize = #Prize#, id_insert_by = #InsertByUserId#, id_update_by = #UpdateByUserId#, dt_insert = #DtInsert#, dt_update = #DtUpdate#, ind_active = #IsActive#, ind_view = #WasView#, dt_view = #DtWasView#, int_rating = #Rating#, dt_rating = #DtRating#, int_answered_questions_count = #AnsweredQuestionsCount#, int_correct_answered_questions_count = #CorrectAnsweredQuestionCount#, dt_integrated = #DtIntegrated#, ind_integrated = #WasIntegrated#, ind_has_won = #HasWon#, ind_has_second_chance = #HasSecondChance#, int_attempt_count = #AttemptCount#, ind_was_view_second = #WasViewSecond#, dt_was_view_second = #DtWasViewSecond# where id = #Id#
